Name: Eshe's Wish Adventure
About the game: Eshe's Wish Adventure is a traditional side scrolling platform game, with a cartoony cel shaded art style. You play as a cat trying to collect enough wish coins to get her greatest wish. Eshe the cat has been teleported into the land of wishes. You must guide her through wondrous realms to find magical wish coins! Run, Jump, and meow your way through multiple themed levels. You must collect coins to be able to enter magical portals. Game Features: A cute main character At least 3 unique enemies with their own abilities and style Interactive objects within the environment Collect coins to access more levels Hidden easter eggs A cel shaded cartoony art style. 100% of revenue for the first month after release will be going to Make a wish via Playing For Joeys. This is a game to contribute to the Playing For Joeys charity event. The game is designed to be easy to complete and celebrate the streamers who have helped out with the event in 2022.
